title.english: Daily Lives of High School Boys

description:
Tadakuni, Hidenori, and Yoshitake are students at the all-boys academy, Sanada North High School. This is a tale about just that—their daily lives as students. Winning the basketball tournament? Finding true love? You won't find any of that here. Whether it's sparking random arguments while hanging out with friends, meeting that one weird co-worker at a part-time job, or even letting imaginations run wild on a windy afternoon, we've all experienced the show's ordinary but true-to-life themes at one point or another.

(Source: NIS America)

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

node.description: Audio Highs is a Japanese music composer and arranger. They are mostly known for work in Gintama series as music creator.

__[Website](https://www.yukiweb.net/)__

She debuted in the music industry in 1991 as the lead vocalist for the rock band [JUDY AND MARY](https://anilist.co/staff/218017), and as a solo artist in 2002.

name.native: ミックス・スピーカーズ・インク

node.description: Mix Speaker's,Inc. is a Japanese visual kei rock band formed in 2006. The members are AYA (Psycho le Cemu, Isabelle), seek (Psycho le Cému, Isabelle), keiji (Kamikaze Boys, Isabelle), S (Kamikaze Boys, Isabelle), MIKI (Pink Film, SCISSOR, Isabelle), and YUKI (Egurigori).
